1. **Upload Data:** CSV/Excel files with patient response data
2. **Map Columns:** Specify which columns contain patient ID, dates, responses  
3. **Create Plots:** Generate publication-ready visualizations
4. **Export Code:** Download reproducible Quarto/R code

> **Tip:** Sample data is available in the Data Selection tab to help you understand the expected format.
